value_claims.claim_title: 2,500 hours per month saved using AI summary tools
value_claims.claim_description: CBA saved approximately 2,500 hours per month by using AI-powered summary tools to summarize key delivery documents across the organization.
value_claims.source_quote: ~2,500 hours per month saved summarizing key delivery documents with AI summary tools
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time savings are explicitly attributed to AI summary tools used for document summarization tasks.

value_claims.claim_title: 14 hours per month saved through AI-powered Work Breakdown Structure
value_claims.claim_description: CBA saved approximately 14 hours per month using Jira's AI-powered Work Breakdown Structure feature to break down work more efficiently.
value_claims.source_quote: ~14 hours per month saved through the AI-powered Jira's Work Breakdown Structure
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings directly attributed to AI-powered Work Breakdown Structure feature in Jira.

value_claims.claim_title: 1,266 dependencies resolved in Big Room Planning using AI
value_claims.claim_description: During a 2-day Big Room Planning event with 16,000 employees, CBA resolved 1,266 dependencies using Jira's AI search and summary tools, with 16% deprioritized from needing investment.
value_claims.source_quote: 1266 dependencies resolved over 2 days using Jira's AI search and summary tools, with 16% deprioritized from needing investment
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Dependencies resolution explicitly attributed to using Jira's AI search and summary tools during the planning event.

value_claims.claim_title: 100% team participation in Big Room Planning with AI
value_claims.claim_description: After implementing AI features, 100% of participating teams provided initiatives and epics in Jira during Big Room Planning, compared to 80% in the previous quarter.
value_claims.source_quote: 100% of participating teams provided initiatives and epics in Jira versus 80% in the previous quarter
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Increase from 80% to 100% participation coincided with AI implementation, suggesting AI contributed to improved engagement and workflow.

value_claims.claim_title: 20% reduction in epics planned indicating improved prioritization
value_claims.claim_description: CBA planned 20% fewer epics in Big Room Planning compared to the previous quarter, indicating improved work prioritization process enabled by AI tools.
value_claims.source_quote: 20% fewer epics planned versus the previous quarter, indicating that they were improving the work prioritization process
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The reduction in epics is attributed to improved prioritization process, which was enabled by AI tools used during planning.

value_claims.claim_title: 84% of Copilot users would not return to working without it
value_claims.claim_description: Among 10,000 Microsoft Copilot users at CBA, 84% reported they would not go back to working without it, indicating high satisfaction and adoption.
value_claims.source_quote: 84% of 10,000 Copilot users reporting they wouldn't go back to working without it
value_claims.attribution_evidence: User satisfaction directly attributed to Microsoft Copilot usage, demonstrating strong value perception.

value_claims.claim_title: 30% of GitHub Copilot code suggestions adopted
value_claims.claim_description: Approximately 30% of code suggestions generated by GitHub Copilot were adopted by CBA developers, driving efficiency and smarter decision-making.
value_claims.source_quote: approximately 30% of GitHub Copilot code suggestions adopted—driving efficiency and smarter decision-making
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Code suggestion adoption rate directly attributed to GitHub Copilot usage by developers.

value_claims.claim_title: 16% time savings for early Copilot adopters
value_claims.claim_description: Early adopters of Microsoft 365 Copilot at CBA reported saving 16% of their time by reducing repetitive tasks, allowing focus on more meaningful work.
value_claims.source_quote: With Microsoft 365 Copilot, early adopters reported saving 16% of their time by reducing repetitive tasks, allowing them to focus on more meaningful work
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings directly attributed to Microsoft 365 Copilot usage by early adopters through reduction of repetitive tasks.

value_claims.claim_title: Significant improvement in internal customer satisfaction ratings
value_claims.claim_description: CBA experienced significant improvement in internal teams' customer satisfaction ratings after deploying AI features, enabling widespread adoption.
value_claims.source_quote: Significant improvement in internal teams' customer satisfaction ratings, allowing for widespread adoption
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Customer satisfaction improvement explicitly linked to AI features deployment and usage by internal teams.

value_claims.claim_title: GenAI messaging reduces contact center interactions
value_claims.claim_description: CBA's GenAI-enabled messaging service provides more comprehensive self-service capabilities, reducing the need for customers to interact with the contact center.
value_claims.source_quote: The first use case we wanted to go after was how do we make a messaging capability that is used so much day in, day out, [that is] more self-service and more comprehensive.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: GenAI messaging capability explicitly designed to enable self-service and reduce contact center volume.

value_claims.claim_title: GenAI improves customer dispute resolution efficiency
value_claims.claim_description: GenAI enables CBA to understand customer context and infer information during dispute resolution, reducing the need to repeatedly ask customers for additional information.
value_claims.source_quote: The biggest gamechanger here is with generative AI we're able to understand more of the customer context. We're able to infer more of the information without having to ask the customer for more information.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: GenAI directly enables better context understanding and information inference in dispute resolution process.

context_claims.claim_title: CBA serves one in three Australians and one in four businesses
context_claims.claim_description: Commonwealth Bank of Australia is the main financial institution for approximately 33% of Australians and 25% of Australian businesses.
context_claims.source_quote: With one in three Australians and nearly one in four businesses considering the CBA their main financial institution

context_claims.claim_title: CBA has 53,000+ employees
context_claims.claim_description: Commonwealth Bank of Australia employs more than 53,000 staff members.
context_claims.source_quote: 53,000+ employees

context_claims.claim_title: CBA has 9 million daily active users on mobile app
context_claims.claim_description: Commonwealth Bank of Australia's mobile application has 9,000,000 daily active users.
context_claims.source_quote: 9,000,000 daily active users on its mobile app

context_claims.claim_title: CBA has 800,000 shareholders
context_claims.claim_description: Commonwealth Bank of Australia has 800,000 shareholders.
context_claims.source_quote: 800,000 shareholders

context_claims.claim_title: CBA founded in 1911
context_claims.claim_description: Commonwealth Bank of Australia was founded in 1911, making it over 100 years old.
context_claims.source_quote: Although it was founded in 1911

context_claims.claim_title: CBA operates in financial services sector
context_claims.claim_description: Commonwealth Bank of Australia is a financial institution providing a full range of financial services including banking.
context_claims.source_quote: the CBA offers a full range of financial services to help all Australians build and manage their finances

context_claims.claim_title: Jira migrated to Atlassian Cloud in November 2022
context_claims.claim_description: CBA migrated all instances of Jira from on-premise to Atlassian Cloud in November 2022 for 20,000 users.
context_claims.source_quote: This journey started in November 2022, when they moved all instances of Jira from on-premise to Atlassian Cloud. At the time, they were able to move all of their 20,000 users

context_claims.claim_title: Confluence migrated to Atlassian Cloud in December 2023
context_claims.claim_description: CBA migrated all instances of Confluence to Atlassian Cloud from on-premise in December 2023 with 25,000 users.
context_claims.source_quote: In December 2023, with 25,000 Atlassian users, the CBA migrated all instances of Confluence to the Cloud from on-premise.

context_claims.claim_title: CBA first Australian bank to migrate to cloud in 2023
context_claims.claim_description: In 2023, CBA became the first bank in Australia to migrate all users and operations to a cloud platform using Atlassian's data residency program.
context_claims.source_quote: In 2023, with the help of Atlassian's data residency program, the CBA became the first bank in Australia to migrate all of its users and operations to a cloud platform.

context_claims.claim_title: CBA has 35,000 potential AI users
context_claims.claim_description: CBA rolled out Atlassian AI features to 35,000 potential users across the organization.
context_claims.source_quote: Now, with over 35,000 potential users, it was critical for the CBA to have a comprehensive understanding of how enabling AI features would affect its ecosystem.

context_claims.claim_title: CBA positions itself as technology-forward company
context_claims.claim_description: CBA sees itself as a technology-forward company committed to delivering leading technology and solving evolving problems at pace.
context_claims.source_quote: the CBA sees itself as a technology-forward company able to solve ever-evolving sets of problems at pace

context_claims.claim_title: CBA uses AI for software development
context_claims.claim_description: CBA is using generative AI to aid software development teams, including through GitHub Copilot.
context_claims.source_quote: to aid software development teams
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and manage information technology (IT) solutions

context_claims.claim_title: CBA uses AI for customer service and messaging
context_claims.claim_description: CBA deployed GenAI-enabled messaging service to provide self-service capabilities and reduce contact center interactions.
context_claims.source_quote: We launched our GenAI-enabled messaging service, which complements the existing messaging service that we have

context_claims.claim_title: CBA uses AI for dispute resolution
context_claims.claim_description: CBA applies generative AI to customer dispute resolution processes to understand context and reduce information gathering cycles.
context_claims.source_quote: Customer disputes are another area of focus.

context_claims.claim_title: CBA launched 'AI for All' enterprise skilling program
context_claims.claim_description: CBA launched an 'AI for All' program to provide foundational generative AI capabilities to all employees, enabling them to use AI skills in day-to-day jobs.
context_claims.source_quote: We launched our 'AI for All' program where we opened it up to all of our employees and we've given them the foundational capabilities that are required in the generative AI environment

context_claims.claim_title: CBA implements three-tiered AI learning paths
context_claims.claim_description: CBA structured AI skilling through three paths: Leading with AI (executives), Working with AI (all employees), and Building with AI (technical staff).
context_claims.source_quote: CommBank embedded AI skilling across all levels of the organization through three structured learning paths

context_claims.claim_title: CBA partners with AWS and Microsoft for AI
context_claims.claim_description: CBA partners with AWS and Microsoft as part of its AI work and chose not to tie itself to a specific large language model provider.
context_claims.source_quote: CBA partners with the likes of AWS and Microsoft as part of its work. It is also using generative AI in other parts of the bank

context_claims.claim_title: CBA uses AI for mortgage and home buying processes
context_claims.claim_description: CBA is using generative AI to help streamline the home buying and mortgage process.
context_claims.source_quote: to help streamline the home buying and mortgage process
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and manage products and services

context_claims.claim_title: CBA exploring GenAI for product testing with synthetic agents
context_claims.claim_description: CBA is exploring the use of GenAI chatbots to create customer personas or synthetic agents for early experimentation and testing of products and services.
context_claims.source_quote: CBDA chief decision scientist Dan Jermyn unveiled plans to use GenAI chatbots to create customer personas or synthetic agents. These will then be used as an early experimentation tool to test their products.
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and manage products and services

context_claims.claim_title: CBA involves frontline staff in technology development
context_claims.claim_description: CBA's frontline staff are deeply involved in the technology development process, providing customer interaction knowledge and different perspectives.
context_claims.source_quote: They are the ones that have the knowledge of how customers interact with us or customer needs. It's been incredibly interesting and eye-opening working with them

context_claims.claim_title: CBA first in Australia to launch GenAI-powered chatbot
context_claims.claim_description: CBA was the first organization in Australia to launch a generative AI-powered chatbot and messaging experience.
context_claims.source_quote: The ability to launch a generative AI-powered chatbot and messaging experience in itself is very cutting edge. We're the first ones to do it in Australia

context_claims.claim_title: CBA Big Room Planning involves 16,000 employees
context_claims.claim_description: CBA hosts a Big Room Planning event over 2 days involving over 16,000 employees for cross-functional planning and relationship building.
context_claims.source_quote: The CBA hosts a 'Big Room Planning' event, inviting over 16,000 of its employees to get together over 2 full days
